description: This Dart source file defines a PaymentsService class that provides a method to create a payment by sending a POST request to an API endpoint. It handles JSON encoding, API communication via Dio, and error handling.

classes.name: PaymentsService
classes.description: Provides methods to interact with payment-related API endpoints, specifically for creating payments.

methods.name: createPayment
methods.description: Sends a POST request to create a new payment with specified booking ID, amount, and method; returns a Payment object on success.
